welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.content:
# **SmartOrders** Welcome to the documentation.
## About Welcome to the SmartOrders Docs! See the other pages for information on how to install, as well as our API guide!

changelog.name: Changelog
changelog.content:
# **SmartOrders Changelog**
## 1.0.3 - 2020-8-14 ### **Fixed** - Tweens not having Debounce (https://trello.com/c/87fWS683) - Kiosk Gamepass not working. (Please note, that due to caching on Roblox's end, you may have to rejoin or join a new server after you buy the gamepass | https://trello.com/c/kr6vWoc2) - iPad Scaling (https://trello.com/c/nlyVUYiu) ## 1.0.2 - 2020-08-01 ### **Fixed** - Kiosk not Scaling on iPhone 11/XR ## 1.0.1 - 2020-07-28 ### **Fixed** - Points not starting with Group Rank Scripts. ## 1.0.0x - 2020-07-17 ### **Added** - New Decals on Cashier and Kiosk ## 1.0.0 - 2020-07-12 ### **Added** - Major Features Released

apiinstall.name: API Installation
apiinstall.content:
# **Install The API**
Access the API using the following in a **server-script**. ```lua local api = require(game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage").SmartOrders.Api) ``` From there you may use the following things in this guide.

points.name: Points
points.content:
# **SmartOrders API** ## **Points** ---
With SmartOrders, points are not able to be hacked. Therefore, to add points you must use the following API, or through using SmartOrders.
The API Includes: - [​Add Points​]() - ​[Remove Points]()​ - ​[Get Points​]() - ​[On Point Changed​]()
Please note that links don't work yet!

addpoints.name: Add Points
addpoints.content:
# **SmartOrders API** ## **Adding Points** ---

This command allows you to add points through the API.
### **Parameters**
  • Name
    Type
    Description
  • UserId
    Integer
    The ID of the user. Can be gotten from `Player.UserId`.
  • Points
    Integer
    The amount of points to add to the user.

### **Response** Coming Soon.
### **Example** ```lua api.Points:Add(123,1) ```

removepoints.name: Remove Points
removepoints.content:
# **SmartOrders API** ## **Removing Points** ---

This command allows you to remove points through the API.
### **Parameters**
  • Name
    Type
    Description
  • UserId
    Integer
    The ID of the user. Can be gotten from `Player.UserId`.
  • Points
    Integer
    The amount of points to remove from the user.

### **Response** Coming Soon.
### **Example** ```lua api.Points:Remove(123,1) ```

getpoints.name: Get Points
getpoints.content:
# **SmartOrders API** ## **Getting Points** ---
This command allows you get the user's points through the API.
### **Parameters**
  • Name
    Type
    Description
  • UserId
    Integer
    The ID of the user. Can be gotten from `Player.UserId`.

### **Response** Coming Soon.
### **Example** ```lua api.Points:Get(123) ```

onpointchanged.name: On Point Changed
onpointchanged.content:
# **SmartOrders API** ## **On Point Changed** ---

This command detects when a player's point's has changed through the API.
### **Parameters**
  • Name
    Type
    Description
  • Callback Function
    Function
    The function that will be ran when the point has changed.

### **Response**
  • Name
    Type
    Description
  • isManual
    Boolean
    If this is false, it means that the point was updated by SmartOrders.
  • pointAmount
    Integer
    The amount of points the user has.
  • player
    PlayerObject
    The player that has had the points updated.

### **Examples**
## Point Bonus ```lua -- This example is so that if they get 1 point from SO, it'll give another. api.Points.OnPointChanged:Connect(function(isManual,pointAmount,player) if isManual == true then -- This is where if the points was updated by a in-game script, not SmartOrders, it'll return true. return end print("Point added by SO.") api.Points:Add(player.UserId,1) end) ```
## Checking Points ```lua api.Points.OnPointChanged:Connect(function(isManual,pointamount,player) if pointamount % 150 then -- Promo time! As the point amount is divisble by 150. end end) ```

setpoints.name: Set Points
setpoints.content:
# **SmartOrders API** ## **Set Points** ---
V
This command allows you to set a users points value through the API.
### **Parameters**
  • Name
    Type
    Description
  • UserId
    Integer
    The ID of the user. Can be gotten from `Player.UserId`.
  • Points
    Integer
    The number you want to set the users points to.

### **Response** Coming Soon.
### **Example** ```lua api.Points:SetPoints(123,1) ```

orders.name: Orders
orders.content:
# **SmartOrders API** ## **Orders** ---
With SmartOrders, orders can only be created through the machines or API. Therefore, to create or claim orders, you must use the following API:
The API Includes: - [​Create Order​]()
Please note that links don't work yet!

forcecreateorder.name: Create Order
forcecreateorder.content:
# **SmartOrders API** ## **Force-Creating an Order** ---

This command allows you to create an order through the API.
### **Parameters**
  • Name
    w
    Type
    Description
  • Username
    String
    The name of the user. Can be gotten from Player.Name.
  • Ordered Item's
    String
    The name of the user. Can be gotten from Player.Name.
  • Cashier
    String
    The UserId of the player who will recieve the points. Can be gotten from Player.UserId

### **Response** Coming Soon.
### **Example** ```lua api.Orders:ForceCreate("sasial",{"MenuItem1","MenuItem2"},123) ```
